original_title: Emirates boarding pass unlocks hundreds of offers in Dubai this summer
original_body_lines: Emirates has announced the return of its popular My Emirates Pass. Starting from 1st May 2023 to 30th September 2023, My Emirates Summer Pass enables customers to get even more from their trip with five months of exclusive offers at hundreds of locations in Dubai and the UAE.

Emirates customers flying to or through Dubai can simply show their boarding pass and a valid form of identification to hundreds of retail, leisure and dining outlets, as well as famous attractions and luxury spas, to enjoy fantastic discounts throughout Dubai and the UAE.

Passengers who checked in online and downloaded their mobile boarding pass to the Emirates App or Wallet, should save a screenshot of the boarding pass to present at participating venues as the mobile boarding pass disappears from the apps once they have landed.
To see all My Emirates Pass offers, please visit www.emirates.com/myemiratespass.

Dubai’s biggest shopping and family entertainment extravaganza is back, with a whole host of cultural events, fireworks displays, raffle prizes and more. Emirates passengers can take advantage of the offers with My Emirates Pass and enjoy Dubai Summer Surprises at the same time when they fly to Dubai from 29th July 2023 to 3rd September 2023.
